fields.title: Welcome to the New School Year
fields.text: We are excited to welcome all students and families to the 2024-2025 school year. Please review the updated policies in your welcome packet.

fields.title: Parent-Teacher Conferences Scheduled
fields.text: Individual parent-teacher conferences are scheduled for November 22nd. Please sign up for your preferred time slot.

fields.title: Winter Concert Rehearsals
fields.text: All students participating in the winter concert must attend rehearsals on December 5th and 10th. Contact the music teacher for details.

fields.title: School Lunch Menu Updated
fields.text: The cafeteria has updated the lunch menu for December. New healthy options are now available. Menu is posted on the school website.

fields.title: Holiday Break Schedule
fields.text: School will be closed from December 20th through January 14th for winter break. Classes resume on January 15th. Have a wonderful holiday season!
